6 Network  VLSM
4 Network Summarition


VLSM
3 Network 3 Host
2 Network 2 Host

192.168.1.0    3 Host
2^n-2>=3 n=3

192.168.1.00000|000 /29 255.255.255.248 
2^3 = 8
3 Network 3 Host
Network addr        First İp          Last İp           BroadCast addr
192.168.1.0         192.168.1.1      192.168.1.6        192.168.1.7
192.168.1.8         192.168.1.9      192.168.1.14       192.168.1.15
192.168.1.16        192.168.1.17     192.168.1.22       192.168.1.23
192.168.1.24 ----


2 Network 2 Host

192.168.1.24 2^n-2>=2 n=2 2^2=4

192.168.1.0 /30 255.255.255.252


Network addr        First İp          Last İp           BroadCast addr
192.168.1.24        192.168.1.25      192.168.1.26      192.168.1.27     
192.168.1.28        192.168.1.29      192.168.1.30      192.168.1.31
192.168.1.32        192.168.1.33      192.168.1.34      192.168.1.35


2 Network 2 Host  
192.168.1.25-192.168.1.26 
192.168.1.29-192.168.1.30
192.168.1.33-192.168.1.34
/30 255.255.255.252

3 Network 3 Host
192.168.1.1-192.168.1.6 
192.168.1.9-192.168.1.14
192.168.1.17-192.168.1.22
/29 255.255.255.248
